description: These hardshell pants deliver everything you need and nothing you don’t. Ideal for freeriding and ski touring, the Eiger Free Advanced pants break all the rules for feather-light and durable hardshell pants. Boasting technical features and supple fabric with a Gore-Tex ePE membrane that’s waterproof, breathable, PFC-free, and sustainable - these pants ticks all the boxes. Developed alongside our pro athletes Jeremie Heitz and Nadine Wallner, these Eiger Collection overachievers offer full freedom of movement, and all the protection you need for challenging ascents and big powder descents. Fully focused on performance, the Eiger Free Advanced pants are ready to tackle anything you throw at them.
name: Mammut Eiger Free Advanced HS Pants, Reg - Mens
